Eduardo says:

I just reproduced the NPE with a workbench.jar that included the CompositeRuler 
but did not include the lazy instanciation of editors.
Steps to reproduce the NPE:
	- Add breakpoint to OLEEditor createPartControl
	- Run target
	- Open a file associated with an OLEEditor

The NPE happens when the debugger tries to open the OLEEditor class. I think 
this should be fixed before the build tomorrow if possible.

Thanks.
Eduardo.
